name: cordova-plugin-uniquedeviceid
description: PhoneGap / Cordova unique device id (UUID) plugin for Android (up to 7.x), iOS (up to 11.x) and Windows Phone 8.
author: Based on unique device id Domonkos Pal <public@dpal.hu> (https://github.com/Paldom) plus uuid store in ios localstorage working on iOS 11.x
